posts.post_content:
Just because they kept the flavor text, I think they should print an Akroma variant called Akroma, Merciless Angel. Maybe not, though.
  
   
May see play in Extended with blue artifact mana acceleration(?).
  
   
The only downsides to this in EDH is that it's colorless and Legendary (so any player can play it and if someone else does, they blow up) and artifact removal is so easy to come by.
  
   
5/5
